Clip.Title: THE KGB DISSIDENT
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This documentary tells the story of KGB officer Viktor Orekhov who monitored, collected evidence and severely punished the dissidents of the USSR.

Clip.Title: ELIZABETH I: KILLER QUEEN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Did one of the most controversial royal love affairs in history lead to savage murder? New evidence sheds light on the Elizabethan murder mystery that has lain unsolved for 450 years.

Clip.Title: SERIOUSLY AMAZING OBJECTS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: America is truly a melting pot, one that's been simmering for centuries, and made up of warriors, innovators, icons, and the objects they left behind. Follow one lucky couple as they're whisked to Montana to witness a re-creation of the Battle of Little Bighorn. Then watch as a friends' trip to the zoo turns into an art project with pandas. Private tours of the secret vaults to see Edison's first bulbs, the first Colt revolver, and other incredible artifacts make for a Smithsonian visit they'll never forget.

Clip.Title: THE KGB DISSIDENT
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This documentary tells the story of KGB officer Viktor Orekhov who monitored, collected evidence and severely punished the dissidents of the USSR.

Clip.Title: ELIZABETH I: KILLER QUEEN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Did one of the most controversial royal love affairs in history lead to savage murder? New evidence sheds light on the Elizabethan murder mystery that has lain unsolved for 450 years.

Clip.Title: SKY VIEW
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Soar over Europe and experience the landscape from an eagle's perspective. This remarkable series uses the latest HD and camera mount technology to give the audience a view of Europe and its history that will takes their breath away.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the remote Northern Shore of Nova Scotia, to the red mud perimetre of Prince Edward Island, the warm waters of the Northumberland Strait are the setting for an incredible aerial exploration of these coastlines.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Preservation of the World's National Parks
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The world's national parks have become vital sanctuaries and many only exist through the persistence and advocacy of small groups who care deeply about the earth's natural spaces. See how communities rescued the Golden Gate National Recreation Area from industrial development and what's being done today to protect its dramatic landscapes.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Biofuels: Beyond Ethanol, Plug-In Hybrids and Natural History Museum Goes Green
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Are biofuels the perfect solution, or just a new part of the problem? Explore the next generation of green fuel alternatives. With the hopes of curbing auto's addiction to oil, a group of hybrid hackers is launching a green car revolution by souping up Toyota's Prius. And, find out what one of the oldest, largest natural history museums in the world is doing to go green.

Clip.Title: B-2: STEALTH AT WAR
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The most expensive and specialized airplane ever built, the B-2 Stealth bomber carries a price tag of more than two billion dollars. Highly effective and extremely technically advanced, it has been an integral part of the Air Force arsenal for the past 20 years.

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Despite threats, Father Daniel Vogt stands with Mexico's native Quechi as they struggle to acquire legal title to their ancestral land.

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Rev John Fife scours the desert giving aid to undocumented migrants crossing into America through the life-endangering Sonora Desert.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Emmanuelle embarks upon the mythic railroad line which runs across the valleys of Brahmaputra and the Ganges.

Clip.Title: CORSICA: THE PEARL OF THE MEDITERRANEAN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This series takes us on a journey to discover the island's history, its culture and its proud people.

Clip.Title: THE LAST TIGHTROPE DANCER OF ARMENIA
Clip.Episode: The Last Tightrope Dancer of Armenia
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The two most celebrated tightrope dancers in Armenia are now in their 80s. Now they share the same hope -- that the only remaining tightrope student will carry on their life's work. But will 17 year old orphan Hovsep want to accept the responsibility?

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
